title: 3,200-Mile 2013 Lamborghini Aventador LP700-4 Roadster

The leather-trimmed multi-function steering wheel frames a digital gauge cluster with a central tachometer, a speed readout, and auxiliary gauges for fuel level, coolant temperature, oil pressure, and oil temperature.
